name: Destroy the Asteroids
summary: Destroy the Asteroids is a virtual reality (VR) game where the goal is to destroy as many asteroids as possible and achieve the highest score. The player, immersed in space, uses motion controls to aim and shoot at incoming asteroids. The game is fast-paced, challenging, and offers an intense action experience with 3D graphics, giving players the feeling of being in the middle of a space battle.
